Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business. Our product offers unparalleled value and efficiency, tailored specifically to meet your needs. Considering its exceptional capabilities and the impact it could have on your operations, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $900,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Should you require any further information or wish to discuss this offer in more detail, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this innovative solution to your company. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $900,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $900,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
